Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it attributes a statement to Anthony Fauci without providing any evidence or source to verify its authenticity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Anthony Fauci made the quoted statement, which is proven to be false by the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Anthony Fauci did not make the statement attributed to him.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the severity of the stance by calling it "careless, lazy, heartless."
Understate: No evidence of understatement bias is present in the claim.
Falters at times: No evidence of faltering bias is present in the claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the statement was not made by Anthony Fauci, but by a Facebook user named Amy Wright.
